com.gwtplatform.mvp.client
Class DelayedBindRegistry

java.lang.Object
  com.gwtplatform.mvp.client.DelayedBindRegistry

public final class DelayedBindRegistry
extends Object

A static registry containing all the classes that want to be bound using delayed binding. That is, classes implementing the DelayedBind interface. These classes should be eager singletons and they should register themselves with the DelayedBindRegistry in their constructor by calling register(DelayedBind).

Author:
Philippe Beaudoin

Constructor Detail

DelayedBindRegistry

public DelayedBindRegistry()
Method Detail

bind

public static void bind(Ginjector ginjector)
Bind all the registered classes, by calling their DelayedBind.delayedBind(Ginjector) method. This method should only be called once, typically when the program starts.

Parameters:
ginjector - The Ginjector from which to get object instances.

register

public static void register(DelayedBind delayedBindObject)
Registers a new object so that it is bound using delayed binding. This method should be called in the constructor of objects implementing the DelayedBind interface.

Parameters:
delayedBindObject - The object to register.
